item.title: Java Basics
item.description: Java Basics Java Basics Data Type Primitive type byte/8 char/16 short/16 int/32 float/32 long/64 double/64 boolean/~ Value true(1) false(0) JVM will convert it to int when compiling Types <-> Warpper class boolean - Boolean byte - Byte char - Character float - Float int - Integer long - Long short - Short double - Double Autoboxing Use valueOf() method primitive types -> corresponding object wrapper classes (e.
